body:
Its been here for a couple days now.
Whenever i go onto walls it say "Null" With a health bar under it.
Picture:
http://imgur.com/QuJNBFH
Please Fix it.
Its annoying.
Sighnin Out.

replies.body: Omg don't you realise that this has been put in the 1.8 update and has happened to all softwares of any kind that have been recently updated where signs with no writing on a line will simply say "null"? lol, seriously it's true.
